name: ThisOldMarketingPodcast

”Alexa launch this old marketing podcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: this old marketing podcast
des: Joe Pulizzi and Robert Rose, two of the most well-known experts in the content marketing space, talk about the latest content marketing trends and discuss how businesses can use content to attract and retain customers. Each podcast show features a discussion of content marketing headlines, rants from Joe and Robert on what's going on in the industry, and a "This Old Marketing" example from the past (that we can learn from). Always useful, entertaining and never more than 60 minutes.
